name: Oh My Gem - Smash Them All!
name_original: Oh My Gem - Smash Them All!
description:
Bricks, Blocks and Monkey Fever

A Retro & Addictive, Arcade Puzzle Game

Help Moko and Punchy to protect Gem from the army of MyniMows who are trying to steal it from you! "Oh My Gem" is  a funny minigame with an original horizontal-bouncing gameplay easy enough to be played quickly on the go or when you only have a few minutes.

------------------------------------------ Trailer:
------------------------------------------ How to play: - Tap your finger and launch the brick at the good time to break the yellow blocks.- Hold your finger and make it bounce with the help of Punchy the mole.- You have to avoid the black blocks, or Moko will fall asleep!- To wake him up just hold your finger!- Get bananas and jewels to unlock different Skins- Smash the blocks in chain to make amazing combos and raise your fever bar without being hit to unlock the Quick Monkey Smash Mode!- You can earn bonus items on your adventure to help you complete the rounds with no faults! ScreenShots:

Features:
  • Leaderboard
  • Random puzzles
  • Infinite style game
  • One finger control
  • 15 Skins to unlock
  • 50 challenging levels of increasing difficulty
  • 10 boss
  • Easy but tricky to play 
  • Free to play

Will you endure the pressure throughout the 50 levels ... The challenge increases with each level as the army of Mynimow becomes stronger!!! Take your chance! Enjoy, Have fun & Good Luck! 

Credits Programmer/ Game Designer… Pierre-Jean Coquet Music/ FX Designer... Pierre-Jean Coquet Producer/ Business Developer … Jonathan Sebban ---------------------------------------------------------------------

“Oh My Gem” is only available on iOS devices right now and it's totally free even the different items in the shop are free, we plan to release it on other platforms in the upcoming versions. If you find any bugs, don't hesitate to contact us - Feedback and comments are appreciated.
